content: To me, its kinda weird that iterator have last() but not first(). While we are at it, why not something like kth(). This is useful when you are doing something like finding the middle point or something like that, you sort an iterator, then return the kth(len / 2). This way, we can make last() and first() a specialization of kt().

(I think this is the wrong channel, can someone move this to #general or so? #t-lang is for language design, not library questions.)
@Hanif Ariffin there's nth
